   19: %%
   20: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   21: %% File: ct_snmp_SUITE.erl
   22: %%
   23: %% Description:
   24: %%    This file contains the test cases for the ct_snmp API.
   25: %%
   26: %% Test  of SNMP support in common_test
   27: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   28: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   29: -module(snmp_SUITE).
   30: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   31: -include_lib("snmp/include/STANDARD-MIB.hrl").
   32: -include_lib("snmp/include/SNMP-USER-BASED-SM-MIB.hrl").
   33: -include_lib("snmp/include/snmp_types.hrl").
   34: 
   35: -compile(export_all).
   36: 
   37: %% Default timetrap timeout (set in init_per_testcase).
   38: -define(default_timeout, test_server:minutes(1)).
   39: 
   40: -define(AGENT_UDP, 4000).
   41: 
   42: suite() ->
   43:     [
   44:      {require, snmp1, snmp1},
   45:      {require, snmp_app1, snmp_app1},
   46:      {require, snmp2, snmp2},
   47:      {require, snmp_app2, snmp_app2},
   48:      {require, snmp3, snmp3}
   49:     ].
   50: 
   51: all() ->
   52:     [start_stop,
   53:      {group,get_set},
   54:      {group,register},
   55:      {group,override},
   56:      set_info].
   57: 
   58: 
   59: groups() ->
   60:     [{get_set,[get_values,
   61: 	       get_next_values,
   62: 	       set_values,
   63: 	       load_mibs]},
   64:      {register,[register_users,
   65: 		register_users_fail,
   66: 		register_agents,
   67: 		register_agents_fail,
   68: 		register_usm_users,
   69: 		register_usm_users_fail]},
   70:      {override,[override_usm,
   71: 		override_standard,
   72: 		override_context,
   73: 		override_community,
   74: 		override_notify,
   75: 		override_target_addr,
   76: 		override_target_params,
   77: 		override_vacm]}].
   78: 
   79: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   80:     Config.
   81: 
   82: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   83:     Config.
   84: 
   85: init_per_group(get_set, Config) ->
   86:     ok = ct_snmp:start(Config,snmp1,snmp_app1),
   87:     Config;
   88: init_per_group(register, Config) ->
   89:     ok = ct_snmp:start(Config,snmp2,snmp_app2),
   90:     Config;
   91: init_per_group(_, Config) ->
   92:     ok = ct_snmp:start(Config,snmp3,snmp_app2),
   93:     Config.
   94: 
   95: end_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
   96:     catch ct_snmp:stop(Config),
   97:     Config.
   98: 
   99: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  100:     Dog = test_server:timetrap(?default_timeout),
  101:     [{watchdog, Dog}|Config].
  102: 
  103: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  104:     try apply(?MODULE,Case,[cleanup,Config])
  105:     catch error:undef -> ok
  106:     end,
  107:     Dog=?config(watchdog, Config),
  108:     test_server:timetrap_cancel(Dog),
  109:     ok.
  110: 
  111: %%%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  112: %%% Test cases
  113: break(_Config) ->
  114:     test_server:break(""),
  115:     ok.
  116: 
  117: start_stop(Config) ->
  118:     ok = ct_snmp:start(Config,snmp1,snmp_app1),
  119:     ct:sleep(1000),
  120:     {snmp,_,_} = lists:keyfind(snmp,1,application:which_applications()),
  121:     [_|_] = filelib:wildcard("*/*.conf",?config(priv_dir,Config)),
  122: 
  123:     ok = ct_snmp:stop(Config),
  124:     ct:sleep(1000),
  125:     false = lists:keyfind(snmp,1,application:which_applications()),
  126:     [] = filelib:wildcard("*/*.conf",?config(priv_dir,Config)),
  127:     ok.
  128: 
  129: get_values(_Config) ->
  130:     Oids1 = [?sysDescr_instance, ?sysName_instance],
  131:     {noError,_,V1} = ct_snmp:get_values(agent_name,Oids1,snmp1),
  132:     [#varbind{oid=?sysDescr_instance,value="Erlang SNMP agent"},
  133:      #varbind{oid=?sysName_instance,value="ct_test"}] = V1,
  134:     ok.
  135: 
  136: get_next_values(_Config) ->
  137:     Oids2 = [?system],
  138:     {noError,_,V2} = ct_snmp:get_next_values(agent_name,Oids2,snmp1),
  139:     [#varbind{oid=?sysDescr_instance,value="Erlang SNMP agent"}] = V2,
  140:     ok.
  141: 
  142: set_values(Config) ->
  143:     Oid3 = ?sysName_instance,
  144:     NewName = "ct_test changed by " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE),
  145:     VarsAndVals = [{Oid3,s,NewName}],
  146:     {noError,_,_} =
  147: 	ct_snmp:set_values(agent_name,VarsAndVals,snmp1,Config),
  148: 
  149:     Oids4 = [?sysName_instance],
  150:     {noError,_,V4} = ct_snmp:get_values(agent_name,Oids4,snmp1),
  151:     [#varbind{oid=?sysName_instance,value=NewName}] = V4,
  152: 
  153:     ok.
  154: 
  155: load_mibs(_Config) ->
  156:     [{'SNMPv2-MIB',_}=SnmpV2Mib] = snmpa:which_mibs(),
  157:     Mib = filename:join([code:priv_dir(snmp),"mibs","SNMP-USER-BASED-SM-MIB"]),
  158:     ok = ct_snmp:load_mibs([Mib]),
  159:     TwoMibs = [_,_] = snmpa:which_mibs(),
  160:     [{'SNMP-USER-BASED-SM-MIB',_}] = lists:delete(SnmpV2Mib,TwoMibs),
  161:     ok = ct_snmp:unload_mibs([Mib]),
  162:     [{'SNMPv2-MIB',_}] = snmpa:which_mibs(),
  163:     ok.
  164: 
  165: 
  166: register_users(_Config) ->
  167:     [] = snmpm:which_users(),
  168:     ok = ct_snmp:register_users(snmp2,[{reg_user1,[snmpm_user_default,[]]}]),
  169:     [_] = snmpm:which_users(),
  170:     [_] = ct:get_config({snmp2,users}),
  171:     ok = ct_snmp:register_users(snmp2,[{reg_user2,[snmpm_user_default,[]]}]),
  172:     [_,_] = snmpm:which_users(),
  173:     [_,_] = ct:get_config({snmp2,users}),
  174:     ok = ct_snmp:register_users(snmp2,[{reg_user3,[snmpm_user_default,[]]}]),
  175:     [_,_,_] = snmpm:which_users(),
  176:     [_,_,_] = ct:get_config({snmp2,users}),
  177:     ok = ct_snmp:unregister_users(snmp2,[reg_user3]),
  178:     [_,_] = snmpm:which_users(),
  179:     [_,_] = ct:get_config({snmp2,users}),
  180:     ok = ct_snmp:unregister_users(snmp2),
  181:     [] = snmpm:which_users(),
  182:     [] = ct:get_config({snmp2,users}),
  183:     ok.
  184: register_users(cleanup,_Config) ->
  185:     ct_snmp:unregister_users(snmp2).
  186: 
  187: register_users_fail(_Config) ->
  188:     [] = snmpm:which_users(),
  189:     {error,_} = ct_snmp:register_users(snmp2,[{reg_user3,[unknown_module,[]]}]),
  190:     [] = snmpm:which_users(),
  191:     ok.
  192: register_users_fail(cleanup,_Config) ->
  193:     ct_snmp:unregister_users(snmp2).
  194: 
  195: register_agents(_Config) ->
  196:     {ok, HostName} = inet:gethostname(),
  197:     {ok, Addr} = inet:getaddr(HostName, inet),
  198: 
  199:     [] = snmpm:which_agents(),
  200:     ok = ct_snmp:register_users(snmp2,[{reg_user1,[snmpm_user_default,[]]}]),
  201:     ok = ct_snmp:register_agents(snmp2,[{reg_agent1,
  202: 					 [reg_user1,Addr,?AGENT_UDP,[]]}]),
  203:     [_] = snmpm:which_agents(),
  204:     [_] = ct:get_config({snmp2,managed_agents}),
  205:     ok = ct_snmp:register_agents(snmp2,[{reg_agent2,
  206: 					 [reg_user1,Addr,?AGENT_UDP,[]]}]),
  207:     [_,_] = snmpm:which_agents(),
  208:     [_,_] = ct:get_config({snmp2,managed_agents}),
  209: 
  210:     ok = ct_snmp:register_agents(snmp2,[{reg_agent3,
  211: 					 [reg_user1,Addr,?AGENT_UDP,[]]}]),
  212:     [_,_,_] = snmpm:which_agents(),
  213:     [_,_,_] = ct:get_config({snmp2,managed_agents}),
  214: 
  215:     ok = ct_snmp:unregister_agents(snmp2,[reg_agent3]),
  216:     [_,_] = snmpm:which_agents(),
  217:     [_,_] = ct:get_config({snmp2,managed_agents}),
  218: 
  219:     ok = ct_snmp:unregister_agents(snmp2),
  220:     ok = ct_snmp:unregister_users(snmp2),
  221:     [] = snmpm:which_agents(),
  222:     [] = ct:get_config({snmp2,managed_agents}),
  223:     ok.
  224: register_agents(cleanup,_Config) ->
  225:     ct_snmp:unregister_agents(snmp2),
  226:     ct_snmp:unregister_users(snmp2).
  227: 
  228: register_agents_fail(_Config) ->
  229:     {ok, HostName} = inet:gethostname(),
  230:     {ok, Addr} = inet:getaddr(HostName, inet),
  231: 
  232:     [] = snmpm:which_agents(),
  233:     {error,_}
  234: 	= ct_snmp:register_agents(snmp2,[{reg_agent3,
  235: 					  [unknown_user,Addr,?AGENT_UDP,[]]}]),
  236:     [] = snmpm:which_agents(),
  237:     ok.
  238: register_agents_fail(cleanup,_Config) ->
  239:     ct_snmp:unregister_agents(snmp2).
  240: 
  241: register_usm_users(_Config) ->
  242:     [] = snmpm:which_usm_users(),
  243:     ok = ct_snmp:register_usm_users(snmp2,[{"reg_usm_user1",[]}]),
  244:     [_] = snmpm:which_usm_users(),
  245:     [_] = ct:get_config({snmp2,usm_users}),
  246:     ok = ct_snmp:register_usm_users(snmp2,[{"reg_usm_user2",[]}]),
  247:     [_,_] = snmpm:which_usm_users(),
  248:     [_,_] = ct:get_config({snmp2,usm_users}),
  249:     ok = ct_snmp:register_usm_users(snmp2,[{"reg_usm_user3",[]}]),
  250:     [_,_,_] = snmpm:which_usm_users(),
  251:     [_,_,_] = ct:get_config({snmp2,usm_users}),
  252:     ok = ct_snmp:unregister_usm_users(snmp2,["reg_usm_user3"]),
  253:     [_,_] = snmpm:which_usm_users(),
  254:     [_,_] = ct:get_config({snmp2,usm_users}),
  255:     ok = ct_snmp:unregister_usm_users(snmp2),
  256:     [] = snmpm:which_usm_users(),
  257:     [] = ct:get_config({snmp2,usm_users}),
  258:     ok.
  259: register_usm_users(cleanup,_Config) ->
  260:     ct_snmp:unregister_usm_users(snmp2).
  261: 
  262: register_usm_users_fail(_Config) ->
  263:     [] = snmpm:which_usm_users(),
  264:     {error,_}
  265: 	= ct_snmp:register_usm_users(snmp2,[{"reg_usm_user3",
  266: 					     [{sec_name,invalid_data_type}]}]),
  267:     [] = snmpm:which_usm_users(),
  268:     ok.
  269: register_usm_users_fail(cleanup,_Config) ->
  270:     ct_snmp:unregister_usm_users(snmp2).
  271: 
  272: %% Test that functionality for overriding default configuration file
  273: %% works - i.e. that the files are written and that the configuration
  274: %% is actually used.
  275: %%
  276: %% Note that the config files used in this test case do not
  277: %% necessarily make up a reasonable configuration for the snmp
  278: %% application...
  279: override_usm(Config) ->
  280:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  281:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  282:     ConfDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"conf"),
  283: 
  284:     Mib = filename:join([code:priv_dir(snmp),"mibs","SNMP-USER-BASED-SM-MIB"]),
  285:     ok = ct_snmp:load_mibs([Mib]),
  286: 
  287:     %% Check that usm.conf is overwritten
  288:     {ok,MyUsm} = snmpa_conf:read_usm_config(DataDir),
  289:     {ok,UsedUsm} = snmpa_conf:read_usm_config(ConfDir),
  290:     ct:pal(
  291:       "MyUsm = ~p~nUsedUsm = ~p",
  292:       [MyUsm, UsedUsm]),
  293:     true = (MyUsm == UsedUsm),
  294: 
  295:     %% Check that the usm user is actually configured...
  296:     [{Index,"secname"}] =
  297: 	snmp_user_based_sm_mib:usmUserTable(get_next,?usmUserEntry,[3]),
  298:     true = lists:suffix("usm_user_name",Index),
  299:     ok.
  300: 
  301: override_standard(Config) ->
  302:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  303:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  304:     ConfDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"conf"),
  305: 
  306:     %% Check that standard.conf is overwritten
  307:     {ok,MyStandard} = snmpa_conf:read_standard_config(DataDir),
  308:     {ok,UsedStandard} = snmpa_conf:read_standard_config(ConfDir),
  309:     ct:pal(
  310:       "MyStandard = ~p~nUsedStandard = ~p",
  311:       [MyStandard, UsedStandard]),
  312:     true = (MyStandard == UsedStandard),
  313: 
  314:     %% Check that the values from standard.conf is actually configured...
  315:     {value,"name for override test"} = snmp_standard_mib:sysName(get),
  316:     {value,"agent for ct_snmp override test"} = snmp_standard_mib:sysDescr(get),
  317:     ok.
  318: 
  319: override_context(Config) ->
  320:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  321:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  322:     ConfDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"conf"),
  323: 
  324:     %% Check that context.conf is overwritten
  325:     {ok,MyContext} = snmpa_conf:read_context_config(DataDir),
  326:     {ok,UsedContext} = snmpa_conf:read_context_config(ConfDir),
  327:     ct:pal(
  328:       "MyContext = ~p~nUsedContext = ~p",
  329:       [MyContext, UsedContext]),
  330:     true = (MyContext == UsedContext),
  331:     ok.
  332: 
  333: override_community(Config) ->
  334:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  335:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  336:     ConfDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"conf"),
  337: 
  338:     %% Check that community.conf is overwritten
  339:     {ok,MyCommunity} = snmpa_conf:read_community_config(DataDir),
  340:     {ok,UsedCommunity} = snmpa_conf:read_community_config(ConfDir),
  341:     ct:pal(
  342:       "MyCommunity = ~p~nUsedCommunity = ~p",
  343:       [MyCommunity, UsedCommunity]),
  344:     true = (MyCommunity == UsedCommunity),
  345:     ok.
  346: 
  347: override_notify(Config) ->
  348:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  349:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  350:     ConfDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"conf"),
  351: 
  352:     %% Check that notify.conf is overwritten
  353:     {ok,MyNotify} = snmpa_conf:read_notify_config(DataDir),
  354:     {ok,UsedNotify} = snmpa_conf:read_notify_config(ConfDir),
  355:     ct:pal(
  356:       "MyNotify = ~p~nUsedNotify = ~p",
  357:       [MyNotify, UsedNotify]),
  358:     true = (MyNotify == UsedNotify),
  359:     ok.
  360: 
  361: override_target_addr(Config) ->
  362:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  363:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  364:     ConfDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"conf"),
  365: 
  366:     %% Check that target_addr.conf is overwritten
  367:     {ok,MyTargetAddr} = snmpa_conf:read_target_addr_config(DataDir),
  368:     {ok,UsedTargetAddr} = snmpa_conf:read_target_addr_config(ConfDir),
  369:     ct:pal(
  370:       "MyTargetAddr = ~p~nUsedTargetAddr = ~p",
  371:       [MyTargetAddr, UsedTargetAddr]),
  372:     true = (MyTargetAddr == UsedTargetAddr),
  373:     ok.
  374: 
  375: override_target_params(Config) ->
  376:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  377:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  378:     ConfDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"conf"),
  379: 
  380:     %% Check that target_params.conf is overwritten
  381:     {ok,MyTargetParams} = snmpa_conf:read_target_params_config(DataDir),
  382:     {ok,UsedTargetParams} = snmpa_conf:read_target_params_config(ConfDir),
  383:     ct:pal(
  384:       "MyTargetParams = ~p~nUsedTargetParams = ~p",
  385:       [MyTargetParams, UsedTargetParams]),
  386:     true = (MyTargetParams == UsedTargetParams),
  387:     ok.
  388: 
  389: override_vacm(Config) ->
  390:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir,Config),
  391:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir,Config),
  392:     ConfDir = filename:join(PrivDir,"conf"),
  393: 
  394:     %% Check that vacm.conf is overwritten
  395:     {ok,MyVacm} = snmpa_conf:read_vacm_config(DataDir),
  396:     {ok,UsedVacm} = snmpa_conf:read_vacm_config(ConfDir),
  397:     ct:pal(
  398:       "MyVacm = ~p~nUsedVacm = ~p",
  399:       [MyVacm, UsedVacm]),
  400:     true = (MyVacm == UsedVacm),
  401:     ok.
  402: 
  403: 
  404: 
  405: 
  406: %% NOTE!! This test must always be executed last in the suite, and
  407: %% should match all set requests performed in the suite. I.e. if you
  408: %% add a set request, you must add an entry in the return value of
  409: %% ct_snmp:set_info/1 below.
  410: set_info(Config) ->
  411:     %% From test case set_values/1:
  412:     Oid1 = ?sysName_instance,
  413:     NewValue1 = "ct_test changed by " ++ atom_to_list(?MODULE),
  414: 
  415:     %% The test...
  416:     [{_AgentName,_,[{Oid1,_,NewValue1}]}]
  417:       = ct_snmp:set_info(Config),
  418:     ok.
